## Library.Context type

Context object provided to [Library.Alias](./design-token-library.library.alias.md) values at runtime

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Context<T extends {}, R extends {} = T> = {
        [K in keyof Readonly<T>]: T[K] extends DesignToken.Any ? Readonly<T[K]> : K extends "type" ? DesignToken.Type : T[K] extends {} ? Context<T[K], R> : never;
    };
```
